camzup.core

    Vert3 Edge3.dest
    The destination vertex.
    Vert3 Edge3.origin
    The origin vertex.
    Vert3[] Face3.vertices
    The array of vertices in a face.
    Methods in camzup.core that return Vert3 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Vert3 Mesh3.getVertex​(int i, int j, Vert3 target)
    Get a vertex from the mesh.
    Vert3[] Mesh3.getVertices()
    Get an array of vertices from the mesh.
    Vert3 Vert3.set​(Vec3 coord, Vec2 texCoord, Vec3 normal)
    Sets the coordinate, texture coordinate and normal of the vertex by reference.
    Methods in camzup.core with parameters of type Vert3 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int Vert3.compareTo​(Vert3 vert)
    Compares this vertex to another by hash code.
    Vert3 Mesh3.getVertex​(int i, int j, Vert3 target)
    Get a vertex from the mesh.
    Edge3 Edge3.set​(Vert3 origin, Vert3 dest)
    Sets this edge by vertex.
    Face3 Face3.set​(Vert3... vertices)
    Sets this face's vertices to refer to a an array.
    Constructors in camzup.core with parameters of type Vert3 
    Constructor Description
    Edge3​(Vert3 origin, Vert3 dest)
    Constructs an edge from two vertices, an origin and destination.
    Face3​(Vert3... vertices)
    Creates a face from an array of vertices.
